name: virtual-code-owners
description: CODEOWNERS with teams for teams that can't use GitHub teams

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsx tools/get-version.ts > src/version.ts && tsx tools/js-json.ts < src/virtual-teams.schema.json > src/team-map/virtual-teams.schema.ts && tsc && prettier --log-level warn --write --use-tabs dist/
scripts.check: npm run format && npm run build && npm run depcruise -- --no-progress && npm test
scripts.depcruise:graph:diff:dev: depcruise src --prefix vscode://file/$(pwd)/ --output-type x-dot-webpage --reaches "$(watskeburt $SHA -T regex)"| browser
scripts.prepack: clean-pkg-json --dry --keep overrides --keep resolutions | jq '.scripts = {test: "echo for test, build and static analysis scripts: see the github repository"}' > smaller-package.json && mv smaller-package.json package.json && prettier --log-level warn --write --use-tabs package.json
scripts.update-dependencies: npm run upem:update && npm run upem:install && npm run check
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run scm:stage

author: Sander Verweij (https://sverweij.github.io/)
